scripts.build: cleancss src/css/app.css -o css/app.css && uglifyjs node_modules/keymaster/keymaster.js src/js/patch_ace.js src/js/utils.js src/js/offline_simple.js src/js/drop_down.js src/js/info.js src/js/file_model.js src/js/settings_pane.js src/js/open_pane.js src/js/help_pane.js src/js/using_apis.js src/js/clipboard.js src/js/save.js src/js/print.js src/js/file_pane.js src/js/patch_ace_history.js src/js/history_tool.js src/js/find_pane.js src/js/keyboard.js src/js/main.js -o js/app.js --source-map src/all.build.map.json --source-map-include-sources --screw-ie8v && html-minifier src/html/app.html -o index.html --minify-js --collapse-whitespace --conservative-collapse
scripts.beauty: cleancss src/css/app.css -o css/app.css && uglifyjs -b -nm -ns node_modules/keymaster/keymaster.js src/js/patch_ace.js src/js/utils.js src/js/offline_simple.js src/js/drop_down.js src/js/info.js src/js/file_model.js src/js/settings_pane.js src/js/open_pane.js src/js/help_pane.js src/js/using_apis.js src/js/clipboard.js src/js/save.js src/js/print.js src/js/file_pane.js src/js/patch_ace_history.js src/js/history_tool.js src/js/find_pane.js src/js/keyboard.js src/js/main.js -o js/app.js --source-map src/all.build.map.json --source-map-include-sources --screw-ie8v && html-minifier src/html/app.html -o index.html --minify-js --collapse-whitespace --conservative-collapse
